titles.title: He's Setting Me Free, With The Holy Ghost Power

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's setting me free with the Holy Ghost power,
He's setting me free this very hour;
Deep down in my soul He's making me whole,
He's setting me free, free, free
With the Holy Ghost power.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's giving me life with the Holy Ghost power,
He's giving me life this very hour;
He's down in my spirit, now devil you hear it!
He's giving me life, life, life
With the Holy Ghost power.
